Package animals

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
animals.Animal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Orc
public abstract class Animal extends Object
Common parent of all animal classes. Contains common methods

      type - Type of the animal, can give special effects
      maxHealth - The maximum health of the animal
      abilities - Abilities the animal is able to use

    • addOffensiveTraits

      protected void addOffensiveTraits(AnimalTrait... traits)
      Add a number of offensive traits. These are modifiers to outgoing damage
      Parameters:
      traits - Any number of traits to add

    • addDefensiveTraits

      protected void addDefensiveTraits(AnimalTrait... traits)
      Add a number of defensive traits. These are modifiers to incoming damage
      Parameters:
      traits - Any number of traits to add

      The animal's remaining health
